name: i would rather have cake
description:
created for O2A2: Queer jam

There's a girl, and a pastry chef.
They talk about cakes.
It's cold.

Features:

  • 1 sprite
  • 1 thousand words
  • 1 music track
  • 4 cake options
  • 2 endings
  • sugar and spice but not everything nice

  • mlkrn, text
